title: Client chat disconnecting
body:
Hey everyone, 
I was wondering if there's anyone out there that can help. So for about a year now I always thought it was the client that was screwing up so i keep disconnecting from chat. I brought my PC recently to my friends house for a lan night and found out when i was connected to her internet there was no connection problem. I'm not sure how my internet is affecting the chat since everything else works find and i have not disconnect from games or anything like that.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me, let me know if this helps.
